name: Epicmafia Alt Icons
description:
Alt Icons for Epicmafia for anyone who wants them. 

Most aren't radically different icons rather some small changes I made to icons I wanted to change. 
Or Alternative Icons that other players made that I thought were great.
Most changes are small.
additional_info: You need Stylish for this style If your icons do not change initially click the stylish icon and then save there should be a 1 on the Stylish icon. If you do not like a particular icon surround the text with a */ /* comment Example: */ .role-NAME { background: transparent url('CODE HERE') no-repeat scroll left top !important; } /* Original Code Credit to Riddler Leave feedback at My Player Page about which icons should look awkward or out of place or simply could be better. 5.18.12 Icon Differences Village Villager, Doctor, Nurse, Sleepwalker (Color edit to icon credited to MeMyselfandBi) , Governor, Town Crier, Loudmouth (Credit to nadaaver), Priest, Virgin, Oracle, Enchantress, Granny (Face edit to icon credited to Riddler),Sheriff (Face direction edit to icon credited to Riddler) Chef (Small edits credited to Waterfall) Mafia Yakuza, Godfather (Credit to Riddler), Tailor, Hooker, Disguiser, Actress, Fiddler (Credit to MeMyselfandBi), Forger, Ninja Third Party Fool, Lyncher (Credit to Riddler), Angel, Clockmaker, Prophet, Mastermind
